member.name: ID3D12VideoDecoder1.GetProtectedResourceSession
member.summary: Gets the that was passed into when the was created.
member.param: The globally unique identifier (GUID) for the ID3D12ProtectedResourceSession interface.
Receives a void pointer representing the ID3D12ProtectedResourceSession interface.

member.name: ID3D12VideoDecoder1
member.summary: Represents a Direct3D 12 video decoder that contains resolution-independent resources and state for performing the decode operation. Inherits from and adds support for protected resources.
